biotools.summary: Guide (Genome Informatics Data Explorer) is a desktop application designed for the bench biologists to analyse RNA-Seq and microarray expression data. It performs gene-centric analyses such as differential expression and pathways using well-established R modules. It also integrates useful data from multiple sources, such as gene annotation and orthologue data, and enables editing of R commands to customise the analyses for advanced users.
